short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Meta Ad Library, offering users convenient tools for comprehensive and effective competitive business analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool assists users in filtering high commercial value advertisements and conducting brand research, save advertising images and video materials.

Key Features:
1. Quick Filter Buttons: Instantly filter active ads based on their duration with buttons for three days, one week, two weeks, and three weeks. This helps identify high-value ads, as advertisers typically deactivate ads with low ROI.
2. Detailed Ad Information: View comprehensive details for each ad, including active days, landing page domain.
3. Open and Analyze Ads: Open individual ads in a new tab, explore all ads from a brand for further analysis, and download ad images or videos for your records.
4. Subscription-Based Service: This is a premium extension with a few free trials available to help you decide on subscribing to the service.
